BLOCK.QRY: INSERT INTO ACTTDA_LTA_REQ_TRN(STR_REQ_APP_NO,DT_REQ_APP_DATE,STR_EMPLOYEE_CODE,STR_CATEGORY_CODE,NUM_NET_AMOUNT_REQUESTED, NUM_TIME_SLAB_ID, NUM_AUTO_CALC_DA_AMT, NUM_REQ_DA_AMT, STR_BILL_STATUS,GDT_EFFECT_DATE,GDT_ENTRY_DATE,GNUM_ISVALID,GNUM_SEAT_ID,GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE) VALUES (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)

update acttda_lta_req_trn t set t.STR_BILL_STATUS=?,t.str_name_of_hod=?,t.str_advance_status=?,t.dt_approval_date=?,t.str_remarks_for_approval=?,t.str_bill_number=?,t.dt_bill_date=? where t.str_req_app_no=? and t.gnum_hospital_code=?
update acttda_lta_req_trn t set t.STR_CATEGORY_CODE=?,t.GDT_LSTMOD_DATE=?,t.GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID=?,t.NUM_NET_AMOUNT_REQUESTED=? where t.STR_REQ_APP_NO=? and t.gnum_hospital_code=?
delete from ACTTDA_LTA_REQ_DTL t where t.STR_REQ_APP_NO=? and t.gnum_hospital_code=?
UPDATE acttda_lta_req_trn T SET T.GNUM_ISVALID=0,T.GDT_LSTMOD_DATE=?,T.GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID=? WHERE T.STR_REQ_APP_NO=? AND T.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?
UPDATE ACTTDA_LTA_REQ_DTL T SET T.GNUM_ISVALID=0 WHERE T.STR_REQ_APP_NO=? AND T.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?

update acttda_lta_req_trn t set t.STR_BILL_STATUS=?,t.STR_INTERNAL_AUDIT_EMP_NAME=?,t.STR_INTERNAL_AUDIT_STATUS=?,t.DT_INTERNAL_AUDIT=?,t.STR_INTERNAL_AUDIT_REMARKS=? where t.str_req_app_no=? and t.gnum_hospital_code=?
update acttda_lta_req_trn t set t.STR_INTERNAL_AUDIT_EMP_NAME=?,t.STR_INTERNAL_AUDIT_STATUS=?,t.DT_INTERNAL_AUDIT=?,t.STR_INTERNAL_AUDIT_REMARKS=? where t.str_req_app_no=? and t.gnum_hospital_code=?

update acttda_lta_req_trn t set t.STR_BILL_STATUS=?,t.STR_ESTABLISHMENT_STATUS=?,t.STR_ESTABLISHMENT_EMP_NAME=?,t.DT_ESTABLISHMENT=?,t.STR_ESTABLISHMENT_REMARKS=?,t.STR_ESTABLISH_SANCTION_ORDER=?,t.DT_SANCTION_ORDER_DATE=? where t.str_req_app_no=? and t.gnum_hospital_code=?

update acttda_lta_req_trn t set t.STR_ESTABLISHMENT_STATUS=?,t.STR_ESTABLISHMENT_EMP_NAME=?,t.STR_ESTABLISH_SANCTION_ORDER=?,t.DT_ESTABLISHMENT=?,t.STR_ESTABLISHMENT_REMARKS=? where t.str_req_app_no=? and t.gnum_hospital_code=?
